column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I got the wonton chicken ramen. I found the broth to be a little plain
column2: but it was good. I liked the wontons
column3: but wish there had been a little more to the bowl than broth
column6: and spinach. I would check other ramen places before going back but I would go back and I recommend that everyone give it a try. It was very reasonably priced.
